MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar, affecting properties in Orchardgate and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.46pm. Our engineers are on their way to Provost Wynd substation to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.55pm on Tuesday 3rd November 2020.
